entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap Tourmente 01:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 40 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
